item.description: Windblown is reporting their deepest base of the winter, with 16 to 32 inches. Meet at the ski racks ready to ski at 10:00 am. Remember, Windblown is ** CASH OR CHECK ONLY ** Trail passes are $16, rentals are $17. It is a 90 minute drive from Boston but a world away in terms of the snowpack. You may not get many more chances to ski locally this winter, go for it! I'm not sure if their lunch counter will be open, I am bringing a sandwich.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the Santa hat...

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Windblown Saturday - excellent spring conditions
